name: Longevity Party
description:
The official QQ of fans: 633281293

"Longevity Party" is an unconventional third-person shooter game. Players choose their favorite characters, travel to the 90s game scene, cooperate with their teammates, and fight for "Tang Tang". In this fun party, there is no death, you can't use guns to kill your opponent, you can only knock him out of the field, at the same time, you can also change the terrain, create random obstacles, Win the day.
Features of the game:
1. Unique character design, It looks stupid, but it is.

2. Full of 90s scenes and props design, giving players a happy immersion full of memories.

3. More than 2000 square meters of game space, rich interactive props.






4. Ghost resurrection mode, grasp the rhythm of the resurrection may be able to turn the corner.

5.The game is in the development and collection opinions, welcome everyone to participate in community discussions


:: Note item ::
This is a boring reminder : To have fun with your buddies
